content: this legal text summarizes an agreement between four individuals regarding the division of properties the properties involved include apartments warehouses storage rooms and land in different municipalities the agreement specifies the allocation of shares and the value of each property for each party it also outlines the rights and responsibilities of each party including granting access to certain properties the agreement is effective immediately and the expenses are to be shared equally among the parties the text mentions the marital status of the parties and the origin of the properties all parties have signed the agreement in the presence of a notary
